articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Painter
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Painter
						
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un Wednesday sent a wreath to the bier of Ri To Ik, Kim Il Sung Prize Laureate, Labor Hero, People's Artist and former artist of the Paekdusan Production Company, expressing deep condolences over his death.
